sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO mgv_all_stored_programs ( project_id , project_name , connection_id , host , port , username , catalog_id , catalog_name , schema_id , schema_name , stored_program_id , programtype , stored_program_name , package_id_fk ) VALUES ( #projectId# , #projectName# , #connectionId# , #host# , #port# , #username# , #catalogId# , #catalogName# , #schemaId# , #schemaName# , #storedProgramId# , #programtype# , #storedProgramName# , #packageIdFk# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE mgv_all_stored_programs SET project_id = #projectId# , project_name = #projectName# , connection_id = #connectionId# , host = #host# , port = #port# , username = #username# , catalog_id = #catalogId# , catalog_name = #catalogName# , schema_id = #schemaId# , schema_name = #schemaName# , stored_program_id = #storedProgramId# , programtype = #programtype# , stored_program_name = #storedProgramName# , package_id_fk = #packageIdFk# WHERE 1 = 1
sqlMap.select: SELECT project_id , project_name , connection_id , host , port , username , catalog_id , catalog_name , schema_id , schema_name , stored_program_id , programtype , stored_program_name , package_id_fk FROM MGV_ALL_STORED_PROGRAMS

SELECT A.PROJECT_ID , A.PROJECT_NAME , A.CONNECTION_ID , A.HOST , A.PORT , A.USERNAME , A.CATALOG_ID , A.CATALOG_NAME , A.SCHEMA_ID , A.SCHEMA_NAME , A.STORED_PROGRAM_ID , A.PROGRAMTYPE , A.STORED_PROGRAM_NAME , A.PACKAGE_ID_FK FROM ( SELECT PROJECT_ID , PROJECT_NAME , CONNECTION_ID , HOST , PORT , USERNAME , CATALOG_ID , CATALOG_NAME , SCHEMA_ID , SCHEMA_NAME , STORED_PROGRAM_ID , PROGRAMTYPE , STORED_PROGRAM_NAME , PACKAGE_ID_FK , ROWNUM FROM MGV_ALL_STORED_PROGRAMS WHERE 1=1
PROJECT_ID = #searchKeyword#
PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MGV_ALL_STORED_PROGRAMS WHERE 1=1
PROJECT_ID = #searchKeyword#
PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
